verbose_text: In addition, microRNAs (miRNAs or miRs) can bind with messenger RNAs (mRNAs) of target gene, thus negatively regulating gene expression and affecting the occurrence and progression of a variety of tumors, Luthra et al reported that miR-196a negatively regulates the expression of the ANXA1 gene, thus affecting the prognosis of esophageal adenocarcinoma.
